comment: Professor Z is an amazing teacher, and person. He is caring and will do anything to help if needed. He replies to emails quickly, and always answers questions. He is funny, but also serious when needed, which makes him respected. His class is easily my favorite so far, and I hope I get the opportunity to take him again.

I took his class as a Hybrid! It was my first hybrid class and the work looks overwhelming at first but it is really easy! He gives a good amount of time to complete it and does not accept late work. There are 4 essays and he drops your lowest, discussion posts, and reading! Take him!!!
so sweet. takes attendance every class and grades kinda tough. he cares about his students and he is a good professor.

Professor Zearfoss is AMAZING. I wish every professor taught like him. He is willing to help you matter what and gives great feedback. His syllabus is clear and so are his instruction for every assignment. If you have a problem with attendance you may not want to take him. He does take attendance every class but definitely take him if you can.
Mr. Z is a thoughtful, critical editor! Would definitely take again.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: He just reads slides sometimes and its really annoying because his voice can be monotone. He's pretty chill but I had him at 8pm and his voice was not what I needed to hear. Other than that, he's alright; he answers emails pretty quick so don't hesitate to ask. Essays are pretty clear but don't ever turn anything late or miss the peer reviews.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Clear grading criteria

comment: I took this class as a hybrid. Mr. Zearfoss is a very laid back teacher. He makes it clear what he's looking for in class. He doesn't accept late work at all. He also gives great feedback. He's a fairly tough grader, but he's always willing to help. I'd take this class again.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Gives good feedback--Get ready to read

comment: I took his hybrid class, there's a $30 website online that you need to have and a $30 book. Not too bad there. He is very nice but boring and gives you a lot of assignments that take some time. No more than an hour if you're a good writer.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: 4 essays and 5 response papers, pretty easy grader and is always there for help. Very nice, young, and enthusiastic. Best comp teacher ive ever had. Highly recommend.
I felt like I could take this class online. I never learned much during class. He is VERY boring. I wouldn't take him again

Professor Zearfoss is an amazing professor. As a dual enrollment student, I looked at RMP to see what I was getting into & he definitely lives up to his reviews. He is very clear about the assignments & what he expects & if you follow the criteria, you get a good grade. He's also very very nice and open to helping you whenever you need it.

He's a young guy, so you expect him to be a little bit cooler than he actually is. He definitely grades the essays super tough, but reading responses are easier. No final exam, just a final essay. You have to follow the requirements for the essays and you'll at least make a low B.

Professor Zearfoss is what I consider to be a enjoyable teacher. He lecture are well taught and he is willing to help no matter what the issue maybe. I high suggest taking his class..!!! You won't regret it..
I loved his class. He is a nice and funny guy. Very helpful when you talk to him and let him know whats's going on. Essays weren't easy but not too hard either.

Loved Mr. Z. He was super helpful, always willing to look over my paper with advice before submitting it for a grade. As long as you're willing to read and discuss the material, it will be a good class. He also makes discussions thought provoking and relates everything to modern day. I had fun, and did pretty well.

He is a nice guy, He is a tough grader, so make sure you know what you're getting into before you take his class. He is always available during his office hours. Im taking him again for Composition II.

He is a great professor. He is somewhat of a tough grader, but he tells you why you got something wrong. I got a low B on my first paper and A's on the rest and I felt like I learned a lot in this class. I would highly recommend him.

Honestly, he's very confusing because when you say something he does't say if you're right or wrong he says "sure" or "ok" and it's very annoying because it makes me second guess myself. He is a tough grader. He would tell me my essay is awesome etc. but gives me a terrible grade which doesn't make any sense...
great professor, very chill and laid back,gives good feedback and always willing to help

Mr. Z is the best! He's helpful, relaxed and always has a positive attitude. The paper's are fairly easy as long as you can form an opinion based on facts. He uses a peer editing system that helps too. I would recommend him.

Mr. Z is super nice. He wants you to learn and do well so he is always willing to help! The class itself is just an extension of engl1101 so it can be repetitive and boring but he is really laid back. Take him if at all possible.
Me. Z is freaking awesome. He's so nice and super understanding. He's also hilarious and in his own band. He's really laid back and cool.

I love Mr. Z! If you want kuddos on papers and discussions, make sure you talk and grasp his attention. A lot of his assignments were pointless, but he basically just wants us to have as many grades in the grade book to balance the essays. He grades a little tough on these essays. Overall, he is not too bad at all.

Mr. Z is very consistent, and fair. The semester goes by fast (paper, after paper), but it's a good pace and doesn't give you a time to "slack". I've gotten an A on 2 out of 3 papers so far, but I have definitely worked for them. Make sure to get help at the Writing Center, and from him (email, office hrs). Books besides novels weren't used much.

If you put the effort in, you will receive a good grade. Most people think they will get away with mediocre work, but you will not. I was the only one to make an "A" on the first assignment, but many people made "B's". I have made an "A" on all three papers so far. He is always there to help and I recommend meeting with him for papers, it helps.
Mr. Z is a very fair teacher. Go to class and you will walk away witha good grade.
Mr. Z is good professor who grades clearly and fairly. I would recommend him.

I am taking Mr. Zearfoss right now for English 1101 and I like him. His class may be boring most of the time, but it is a easy class as long as you do all your papers. His class consists of 5 papers, that's it. Don't expect a good grade if you just b.s. your papers. You need to put effort into your writing. He also is always their to help.
he's okay, nice and likes to work with people. he's just super awkward because he looks our age so no1 really listens to him, and its humoring when he tries to punnish us.
